title: Rework passives of zilean and heimerdinger
body: they are useless and completely uninteractive

replies.body:
Heimerdingers passive is fine.

Zileans is trash

Heimerdinger's passive is very much useful. On top of being able to hide his bitch ass behind a wall of turrets, if you even manage to get a hit off on him, his massive health regen will heal it right back up. In addition, lots of champions get more regen standing next to Heimer than any item in the game can offer aside from Warmog's.
They should buff Lee sin instead! Heimer and Zilean are fine

Zilean's passive offers him about 1500 experience to lvl 18.

What if he were gaining 5% or 10% of that gained experience as AP ?
5% ==> 75 AP

or 10% ==> 150 AP

The Donger's passive is so that his turrets don't get insta gibbed just because the enemy is bursty.  If they don't have the AP to delete his turrets, they'll come back after a while.

I, however, cannot defend Zilean's passive.  It's terribad, no matter how you slice it.

Edit:  It was bad _BEFORE_ they nerfed it's global range.

Did you know that Heimerdinger has the highest HP5 in the game at every level? The more you know.

#ReworkDongerPassiveNow

Seriously. Why does he even still have this thing? They should've given him a turret-focused passive with his rework.

I play the donger who has the highest HP5 in the game. You play Sion. You try to 1v1 me.  I stun you, fire my rockets, let my turrets take you down, Zhonya's, but because you're playing Sion and have built a ton of MR because you're Sion, you survive with 500 health and kill me because I couldn't regen fast enough.

It doesn't matter if you regen 100 health per second if you're insanely squishy and have no defensive abilities.  Someone will be able to burst you down, or have enough DPS to do enough sustained damage.
